channel.title: Comments on: Irish OpenCoffee Club – entrepreneur/startup meetups

item.title: By: Clonmel Coffee at 12 entries
item.dc:creator: Clonmel Coffee at 12 entries
item.description: [...] Coffee first came to my attention back in February 07 via Fergus Burns who mentioned the need for entrepreneurs to meet with other like minded individuals and discuss [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] Coffee first came to my attention back in February 07 via Fergus Burns who mentioned the need for entrepreneurs to meet with other like minded individuals and discuss [...]

item.title: By: Jan Blanchard
item.dc:creator: Jan Blanchard
item.description: This is a great initiative. If we start next Thursday, I'll be in the Clarion hotel in Limerick armed with my Mac book. and I might even travel the country to taste the coffee!
item.content:encoded: This is a great initiative. If we start next Thursday, I’ll be in the Clarion hotel in Limerick armed with my Mac book. and I might even travel the country to taste the coffee!

item.title: By: Eoghan McCabe
item.dc:creator: Eoghan McCabe
item.description: Great idea. I've made a proposal for a Dublin OpenCoffee Club over at my blog. Suggestions and feedback appreciated: http://www.eoghanmccabe.com/naive-by-design/dublin-opencoffee-club-next-thursday-morning/
item.content:encoded: Great idea. I’ve made a proposal for a Dublin OpenCoffee Club over at my blog. Suggestions and feedback appreciated: http://www.eoghanmccabe.com/naive-by-design/dublin-opencoffee-club-next-thursday-morning/

item.title: By: Naive by Design | Dublin OpenCoffee Club Next Thursday Morning
item.dc:creator: Naive by Design | Dublin OpenCoffee Club Next Thursday Morning
item.description: [...] Web 2.0 Ireland is calling Irish entrepreneurs to action: start Irish OpenCoffee Clubs. OpenCoffee Clubs are: [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] Web 2.0 Ireland is calling Irish entrepreneurs to action: start Irish OpenCoffee Clubs. OpenCoffee Clubs are: [...]

item.title: By: James Corbett
item.dc:creator: James Corbett
item.description: Great idea. I'm proposing the lobby of the Clarion Hotel in Limerick which is the most comfortable venue with free wifi that I know of in the city.
item.content:encoded: Great idea. I’m proposing the lobby of the Clarion Hotel in Limerick which is the most comfortable venue with free wifi that I know of in the city.

item.title: By: Paul M. Watson
item.dc:creator: Paul M. Watson
item.description: I honestly cannot think of a coffee shop in Waterford city that has WiFi. I'll keep an eye out though.
item.content:encoded: I honestly cannot think of a coffee shop in Waterford city that has WiFi. I’ll keep an eye out though.
